name: Metamorphia Demo
description:
Metamorphia is a Story-Rich, Top-Down Shooter, where you must fight your way through a deserted facility, infested with transformed personnel. Uncover intel and find out as to what caused the incident in the Arcana facility.

A private military organization “ARCANA” conducted research on effective biochemical weaponry. They succeeded by creating a gas. Its inhalation affects every living organism on a cellular level, hereby referred to as "the transformed" Due to human error large portion of the gas was released outside the facility. 

In only 3 days several cities have been overrun by the transformed. a large portion of the gas remains trapped in the facility, if it were to be released, humanity would cease to exist. 

Your mission as a mercenary is to covertly secure or destroy the remaining chemicals. Be aware, transformed personal have enhanced physical capabilities.

Intel

A big part of your journey is to uncover secrets and puzzle together pieces of information to see the bigger picture. Listen to recordings and uncover the true mission of the Arcana facility.

Combat

The road won’t be easy. You’ll have to battle your way through with multiple types of mutated enemies. Find their weakness and learn more about them. Fight bosses and clear sectors to continue your path.

Weaponry

Discover weapons to fit your style. Discover fragments to build deadly prototype weapons of war. Find armor pieces to equip yourself with, to make it through the deadly enemies.

  • Eye pleasing pixelated art style
  • Engaging top-down experience
  • User friendly controls
  • Uncover secrets of the facility
  • Find many different types of weaponry
  • Precise ranged combat
  • Listen to your army assistant Diane as she will provide crucial intel
  • Unlock crates and loot the enemies 
  • You must have a thought and hack into many doors
